column4: <--- Necessary dummy command for the beginning #######################
<--- Prepare some collision gas for flushing
<--- Pump the bellows with the turbo pump
<--- Fill the T-piece (left of bellows) with working reference CO2
<--- Adjust the pressure in the reference bellow
<--- The light gas refill starts here ################################
<--- Fill the X-piece (right of X bellow) with CO2
<--- Adjust the pressure in the sample bellow
